newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss set terms of 3-month money market claims.
newsitem.headline: Swiss set terms of 3-month money market claims.

text.p: The Swiss federal government set a price of 99.654 on its latest series 3.357 of three-month money market claims, to produce a yield of 1.374 percent, the Swiss National Bank said.
A total of 903.2 million Swiss francs was allocated in the latest series, which will be paid for on October 24.
The previous series 3.356, paid for on October 17, raised 726.15 million francs and was priced at 99.672 to yield 1.302 percent annually.
